statements: SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Residential'
SELECT permit_id, property_address, applicant_name FROM building_permits WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type FROM building_permits ORDER BY applicant_name DESC
SELECT permit_id, property_address FROM building_permits ORDER BY permit_id ASC
SELECT * FROM building_permits ORDER BY permit_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type FROM building_permits WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT permit_id, property_address, permit_type FROM building_permits ORDER BY property_address
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE applicant_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status='Approved';
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type='Renovation';
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE land_use_compliance=true;
SELECT * FROM building_permits ORDER BY applicant_name ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM land_use_regulations WHERE regulation_id='12345';
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'approved';
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type FROM building_permits WHERE land_use_compliance = true;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, permit_status FROM building_permits ORDER BY permit_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'construction' AND land_use_compliance = true;
SELECT permit_id, applicant_name, permit_type, permit_status FROM building_permits JOIN land_use_regulations ON building_permits.permit_type = land_use_regulations.regulation_name;
SELECT * FROM BuildingPermits;
SELECT permit_id, permit_number, applicant_name FROM BuildingPermits;
SELECT * FROM PermitApprovals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT permit_id, approval_status FROM PermitApprovals WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type FROM BuildingPermits WHERE permit_status = 'Issued';
SELECT * FROM BuildingPermits WHERE permit_type = 'Construction' AND permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT permit_id, permit_number, applicant_name FROM BuildingPermits ORDER BY permit_number DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, COUNT(*) as total_permits FROM BuildingPermits GROUP BY applicant_name ORDER BY total_permits DESC;
SELECT p.permit_id, p.permit_number, a.approval_date FROM BuildingPermits p JOIN PermitApprovals a ON p.permit_id = a.permit_id WHERE a.approval_status = 'Finalized';
SELECT * FROM LandUseRegulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Environmental' ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_type, applicant_name FROM building_permits ORDER BY applicant_name ASC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM land_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT application_id, application_date FROM permit_applications WHERE application_status = 'Pending';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM compliance_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM permit_applications WHERE application_status = 'Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type, date_issued FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM permit_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT building_permits.applicant_name, land_owners.owner_address FROM building_permits JOIN land_owners ON building_permits.applicant_name = land_owners.owner_name;

SELECT compliance_regulations.regulation_name, permit_applications.application_date FROM compliance_regulations JOIN permit_applications ON compliance_regulations.regulation_id = permit_applications.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM BuildingPermits;
SELECT permit_type, permit_status FROM BuildingPermits WHERE permit_type = 'Construction';
SELECT building_address, building_area FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_area DESC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_description, regulation_category FROM LandUseRegulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Zoning';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM PermitApplications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BuildingPermits;
SELECT permit_type, permit_status FROM BuildingPermits WHERE permit_status='Approved';
SELECT building_address, building_area FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_area DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM PermitApplications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ApprovalHistory AH JOIN BuildingPermits BP ON AH.permit_id = BP.permit_id ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
